characters.label: Sarah, young professional in business casual attire
characters.visual_prompt: Young woman, Sarah, with slightly anxious expression, wearing business casual attire (blazer and blouse), shoulder-length brown hair, slightly frazzled looking, white background.

characters.label: Meeting attendees, diverse group, professional attire
characters.visual_prompt: Diverse group of four people, two men and two women, professional business attire (suits, dresses), sitting around a conference table, slightly blurred, white background.

locations.label: Modern office meeting room with glass walls
locations.visual_prompt: Modern, brightly lit office meeting room. Glass walls, large conference table, ergonomic chairs, whiteboard, minimalist design, view into a busy but uncluttered office space beyond, blurred background.

locations.label: Smaller, unoccupied meeting room with a digital door scanner
locations.visual_prompt: Smaller, modern office meeting room, unoccupied, with a sleek digital door scanner mounted next to the door. Natural light, simple table and chairs, clean and inviting, slightly blurred background.

objects.label: Smartphone displaying the Spaceti app interface
objects.visual_prompt: Smartphone displaying a clean, modern office map interface of the Spaceti app. The map shows available meeting rooms highlighted in green. Close up screen capture, white background.

frames.description: Sarah nervously peeks into a glass meeting room, seeing a meeting in progress, and quickly walks away in the opposite direction.
frames.visual_prompt: POV shot from behind Sarah (c1) as she hesitantly peeks into l1. Her eyes are wide with surprise and a hint of panic. Through the glass walls of l1, a meeting with c2 is in full swing, adding to her visible discomfort. She's quickly turning and speed-walking away from the room, her back to the viewer. The focus is on Sarah's reaction and the crowded meeting room beyond the glass.

frames.description: Sarah confidently walks into the newly booked meeting room, scans her phone at the door, and sits down with relief.
frames.visual_prompt: Sarah (c1) confidently walking towards l2. She is holding o1, scanning it at the digital door scanner. A sense of relief is visible on her face. She enters l2 and sits down, letting out a slight sigh of relief. Soft, natural lighting in the room.
